name: shared-routing
description: This example demos a basic host application loading remote component.

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3000/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/tests/runAll.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
